packages.name: FILENAME OF YOUR ZIPPED MOD(USA)
packages.title: TITLE OF YOUR MOD(USA)
packages.description: IF YOUR MOD IS STANDALONE, PLACE [Standalone] IN THE BEGINNING OF THE DESCRIPTION. IF ITS MEANT TO MERGE WITH OTHER MODS, PLACE [Merge] IN THE BEGINNING OF THE DESCRIPTION
packages.author: CREATOR NAME
packages.version: VERSION NUMBER MUST MATCH WITH VERSION NUMBER YOU PLACED IN MOD INFO TEMPLATE.JSON
